snippet.description: * Shell Programming and Scripting [Archive] - Page 6 - The UNIX and Linux Forums (clueweb12-0301wb-30-20053) http://www.unix.com/unix/linux/f-30-p-6.html ...comparing sed substitution script has been executed successfully or not?? Replacing white spaces in filename awk array problem Stripping characters from a file and reformatting according to another one uuencode is not working properly Running...lines and display the ouput in columnwise Move only files to a folder Removing "Hidden Characters" on a file Please help me ? Unix Script - DB Return Check whether there is a non printable character in the unix variables Need help to make a csv file Advance search using sed/awk/perl shell script options Using external "date" command from awk Find image greater than x pixels? grep out and fix a section Need 4 line...
